changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.organization_entity ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), "name" varchar NULL, dic_element_id int8 NULL, is_archive bool NOT NULL DEFAULT false, created timestamp NULL, modified timestamp NULL, parent_organization_id int8 NULL, CONSTRAINT organization_entity_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.sql: COMMENT ON COLUMN public.organization_entity.parent_organization_id IS 'Идентификатор родительской организации. Если в строке сам родитель, то значение равно null';
